ComicInfo.Title: Outlaw for Hire
ComicInfo.Summary:
Zenescope's fan-favorite character gets her own ongoing series
The critically acclaimed creative team returns.
Great jumping on point!
The most badass archer in comics is back in a brand new ongoing series! From drug lords to corrupt bankers to the things that go bump in the night, no evils that plague the streets will be safe when Robyn Locksley sets up shop as a private detective in New York City.
While Robyn settles into her new life, the Cabal, a collective of mysterious and powerful individuals, sets their sights on bringing down the hooded heroine, who will face the biggest threat of her life.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | David Finch | 1 | B | Cover B | Giuseppe Cafaro, Simone Di Meo & Ylenia Di Napoli | 3 | C | Cover C | Tina Valentino & Leonardo Paciarotti | 4 | D | Cover D | Emilio Laiso & Mirka Andolfo | 5 | RE | Fan Expo Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | Jason Cardy | 2 |
